jobDescription: trustaff is currently seeking an experienced Oncology Registered Nurse for a 13-week travel contract.  The Oncology Registered Nurse will provide and supervise nursing care for cancer patients. The Oncology RN will monitor patient condition, administer medications, and educate cancer patients about treatment options and particularities of the disease.  1+ year of recent Oncology RN experience is required **Most travel contracts include:13-week contractsMultiple Shifts Available; Days & NightsGuaranteed Hours
